item.title: File timestamps in batch files
item.description: Published Actual Birmingham New Street 06:50 06:54 London Euston 08:14 08:23 This is a strange one as it is useful to only a small sub-set of computer users, namely those which write batch files in Windows to optimise their workflows. One of my recent workflows has been to take a file with name XYZ.txt in directory A and move it to directory B ready for a file with the same name (XYZ.
